localString.value: This room leads to an 8 by 8 minesweeper grid.
This room leads to a 12 by 12 minesweeper grid.

To enter a minesweeper game, enter either of the two portals in the nearby rooms (one for each of the two gride sizes available) and speak to the Game Ref, a large billboard placeable. This will also net you the further instructions.
If a player is already playing, you will be unable to start a new game, but you can watch!
High scores are recorded.
This room leads to an 8 by 8 minesweeper grid.
This room leads to a 12 by 12 minesweeper grid.
A portal glows softly before you. You wonder where it leads.
